author: Lilian Harris
summary: Cruel Lies by Lilian Harris is a gripping tale that delves into the intricate web of deceit and betrayal. The protagonist navigates a world full of dark secrets and unexpected twists, making it a must-read for thriller enthusiasts.

title: Advanced Engineering Mathematics
author: Erwin Kreyszig
summary: Advanced Engineering Mathematics by Erwin Kreyszig covers essential mathematical concepts for engineering students, including differential equations, linear algebra, and complex analysis, with practical applications.
